Contact name: Arinne Averbach

Job Description

Our client, a well known Entertainment company, is looking for a Chief of Staff to support the Founder/CEO.

While this role is 100% onsite in West LA, you also must be able to have a 24/7 mentality.

PLEASE ONLY APPLY IF YOU HAVE AN ENTERTAINMENT BACKGROUND!!

Location-West LA

Salary-Up to $200K DOE

What You Will Do:


  • Support the CEO on meeting management, scheduling and travel
  • Coordinate all administrative communication with assistants of founder
  • Support executive team with ad hoc administrative needs they have
  • Provide ad hoc support to marketing team
  • Attend meetings with the CEO and issue emails post meeting that summarizes what was discussed and follow ups
  • Support CEO in program management of major initiatives. You will work closely with the program managers in marketing, ops and PD.
  • Support CEO in gathering key information and creation of daily, weekly and monthly dashboards
  • Help coordinate strategic cross departmental meetings like innovation days, leadership offsites,


strategy through budgeting lifecycles


  • Establish a “fun team” program i.e. employee appreciation moments around key dates like


anniversaries and birthdays, catered lunches etc.


  • Keep the office stocked with kitchen supplies, office supplies
  • Coordinate and manage all facility related programs, dealing with vendors and contractors to


handle issues that arise in the facility. Help team with designing and sourcing furniture for the

office.


  • Handle all package delivery and pick ups for the office


Who You Are:


  • Must have at least 7+ years experience supporting a


C-level executive


  • MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE IN ENTERTAINMENT
  • Bachelors degree preferred
  • Must be detail oriented and able to have clear writing and communication.
